privacy-policy-text:
Edition of 10.02.2023


Privacy Policy


How your personal data is processed and used by Meama LLC.


Company: Meama LLC

Identification Number: 405139425

Judicial Address: Georgia, Tbilisi, Samgori district, Givi Amilakhvari street, N 2

Postal Code: 0109.

Contact Number: 0322 800 808; *0808.


This Privacy Policy informs you about the protection mechanisms of Meama LLC (hereinafter referred to as the "Company") against unauthorized access to personal data. In particular, the present Privacy Policy includes the information that the Company obtains for you during the period of service provided with by coffee vending machine. In such respect, the personal information includes your mobile phone number, which is entered directly while you drop the coffee capsule. If you accept to use your mobile number, it will be used in the following cases:


  • To send an electronic receipt confirming the purchase of the capsule.
  • For direct marketing purposes in accordance with the "Law of Georgia on Personal Data Protection"

The company will take care of the security and protection of your personal data and will not use it improperly.


You have the right to request the following information:


  • What data is processed about you;
  • Purpose of data processing;
  • Legal basis for data processing;
  • How the data was collected;
  • To whom the data was given;
  • The basis and purpose of giving the data.

Your personal information will be used for the following purposes:


  • To communicate with you;
  • To increase the intensity of use of our website www.meama.ge
  • To improve the quality of service;
  • To eliminate defects and claims reported by the User;
  • To notify updated data, products and other news in the company;
  • To provide information for the offers;
  • For fast and effective communication with the User;
  • For marketing and other purposes;
  • To provide details of purchases made by User;
  • To limit/take preventive measures against improper use of the company's website;
  • To protect the requirements stipulated by the legislation of Georgia

The list of the present provision is not limited and includes other grounds prohibited by law
